message:
SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR.pdf: Página 27
Non-Ontological Resource Re-engineering (VI)
To output a new implementation of the ontology 
on the basis of the new conceptual model.
Formalize: to transform the conceptual model 
obtained in task 6 into a formalized model, 
according to a knowledge representation 
paradigm as description logics, first order logic, 
etc.
27
Implement: to implement in an ontology 
language.
© A Method for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources for Building Ontologies 
Boris Villazón-Terrazas, Mari Carmen Suárez Figueroa
speaker: SYSTEM
